Uses of Class
wordcram.WordCram

Packages that use WordCram
wordcram   
 

Uses of WordCram in wordcram
 

Methods in wordcram that return WordCram
 WordCram WordCram.forHtml(java.lang.String html)
          This WordCram will be based on word frequencies in the text of the given html String.
 WordCram WordCram.forHtmlFile(java.lang.String path)
          This WordCram will be based on word frequencies in the text of the given html file.
 WordCram WordCram.forText(java.lang.String text)
          This WordCram will be based on word frequencies in the text of the given text String.
 WordCram WordCram.forTextFile(java.lang.String path)
          This WordCram will be based on word frequencies in the text of the given text file.
 WordCram WordCram.forWebPage(java.lang.String url)
          This WordCram will be based on word frequencies in the text of the given web page.
 WordCram WordCram.forWords(TextSource textSource)
          This WordCram will be based on word frequencies in the text of the given TextSource.
 WordCram WordCram.forWords(Word[] _words)
          This WordCram will be based on the given Word array.
 WordCram WordCram.withAngler(WordAngler angler)
           
 WordCram WordCram.withColorer(WordColorer colorer)
           
 WordCram WordCram.withColors(int... colors)
           
 WordCram WordCram.withFonter(WordFonter fonter)
           
 WordCram WordCram.withFonts(PFont... fonts)
          This WordCram will render words in one of the given fonts.
 WordCram WordCram.withFonts(java.lang.String... fontNames)
          This WordCram will get a PFont for each fontName, via createFont, and will render words in one of those PFonts.
 WordCram WordCram.withNudger(WordNudger nudger)
           
 WordCram WordCram.withPlacer(WordPlacer placer)
           
 WordCram WordCram.withSizer(WordSizer sizer)
